issue.title: [Developer] Follow NullType -> NullField change
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8140](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8140). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The lint CI job is failed since ARROW-8101 merge because ARROW-8101 uses old class name (NullType). The old class name was renamed to NullField by ARROW-2255.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8140?focusedCommentId=17061285) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6649
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6649>
